About Me

Hi, my name is Lloyd and I am Senior IT Systems Engineer with over 20 years experience in Systems Security and Network Operations. I have a background in software and web development using Python, Java, and various JavaScript frameworks. I have had several roles where I served as Project Manager and extensive experience in IT Service Management and developing solutions for businesses

I am most skilled in: Networking CyberSecurity Web development and DevOps

Projects

Super awesome project

github.com/lloydtheandroid

"Sometimes the greatest things in life come from the most unexpected places"

Well, lemme tell ya, brother, I got goin’ on this lil’ adventure here with the aim of learnin’ some of that fancy-shmancy React stuff, you know? But boy oh boy, did this thing take on a life of its own, turned itself into a full-blown, grade-A apperoonie! I tell ya, I been pickin’ up all sorts of tricks and trades along the way, and now I’m just beamin’ with pride to have this bad boy sittin’ pretty in my portfolio. So, if you ain’t got yourself one of them knock-your-socks-off projects yet, I reckon you better hop on that train and whip one up, compadre!
